category.name: PSM

preference.name: RAC_expand_below_batch_size
preference.preference_description: Determines the batch size in which BOM lines are processed when users click View->Expand Below. The selected BOM lines are expanded in levels of batches, the maximum size of each batch is the size set by this preference. Valid Values: Accepts a single integer as a value. A positive integer defines the number of lines processed per batch. Use -1 to indicate no maximum size, in which case all lines in a single level are processed in a single batch.
